derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: perhaps from dialect hallion 'a worthless fellow', changed by association with hell

means.word_mean: 1. a rowdy or mischievous person (usually a young man);

sentences.sentence: "he chased the young hellions out of his yard"
